text: Bu xinyang zhe [qiang zhe he fu ren] wang lun xinshimen [ruozhe he qiongren] shi shuo:“Jiaru ta [mu sheng zhaohuan renlei gui xin de yisilan jiao] shi yi jian haoshi, name, tamen [xinshimen] bu keneng zai women zhiqian shouxian xinfeng ta.” Tamen meiyou yinci [“gulanjing”] er zunxing zhengdao. Tamen shuo:“Zhe shi chenjiu de huangyan.”
